Generation VI.X: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
Generation VI.Y: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit , they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit , they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: The males are usually lazy, but when attacked by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends with no regard for its own safety.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit , but Pyroar doesn't use it on its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The females of a pride work together to bring down prey. It’s thanks to them that their pride doesn’t starve.
Generation IX.Violet: The mane of a male Pyroar heats up to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit during battle. Merely approaching it will cause severe burns.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Area One , Dalizapa Passage East Province: Area Three ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ ) ( Male )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Area One , Dalizapa Passage East Province: Area Three ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ ) ( Male )
